_sText:
Hosties_jump_program

by ZaLoS

inspired by the matrix


This map includes my custom mini game, russian roulette, which is located under all the other mini-games on the jump tower.

hf!


note: this map features hdr, if your computer can not handle hdr, you can turn it off by type mat_hdr_enabled 0 in console.

v2:
Added a two way wall at spawn and made the door open after 15secs to deal with easy rebellions. 


Preview:

much higher quality vid if you go to youtube via this vid and click "watch in high quality"
